trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Adelaide
There were no other sightings in Adelaide on or around September 17th 2009
Summary: two flashing lights in the sky
divs: Sighting Detailsi was on my balcony haveing a smoke as a light plane flow over my house i noticed in the distance (south) a flashing light, it was not a plane as the lights where flashing non stop there was no pause in between the flashing as i was watching this light crossing the sky i through it was strange that this object passed in front of the light plane, i watch planes all the time and have never seen one cross infront of another one being so close together, now the flashing light seem to be a bit higher in the sky then the light plane but i still found this weird as it was moveing in an east direction it passed behind my tree in the back yard i looked north and saw anoer object in the sky same flashing lights as i waited for the other unkown object to reappear behind the tree the second object seem to head south heading for the other object then this object stop paused there for a good 30 seconds at this point the first light reappeard heading for the second object, at this point i noticed the second object start heading down then paused and vanished, the first object keep its caurse and after about 20 second it re appeard it was above the first object now just in front of it its flight path was strange it would stop then move again then it would almost vanish but i could just see it the first object seemed to slow down when it was near the second object at this point i ran downstairs grab the scope of my telescope to get a better view but when i went back out side the two objects had vanished they where completely gone, i only took about 10-20 seconds to grab the scope. at first i through mabey a helecopter but i never seen two helecopter in the sky in adelaide so close together and acting they way they did after it crossed in front of the plane i through that was very odd and the fact that they just vanished was strange to
